column7: Designed and developed to equip incoming LL.M students with the necessary background in U.S. constitutional law, legal research, analysis, and writing for effective classroom performance. Approved for S/U grading only. Prerequisite: Admission to the U.S. LLM program.
column9: Approved for S/U grading only. Prerequisite: Admission to the U.S. LLM program.
